column5: where Did the link for the Chat go...? am I looking in the wrong place... or am I just Crazzzy? I see now that there is a tab on the top of the site but could have sworn there was one in the Main Section.. Someone please tell me I am not crazy... Ohh and who wants to go on the Chat by the way?  there are like 80 members on... lets have a friendly conversation or argument
We put the link up top cause it is now integrated and not a seperate page.
Thank you for clarifying that... I actually thought i was goin nuts...
